update da_market_price
common_field_id = #{commonFieldId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crop_type_code = #{cropTypeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
crop_type_text = #{cropTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

strains_text = #{strainsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

price_type_text = #{priceTypeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

per_price_unit_text = #{perPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

average_price = #{averagePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
average_price_unit_code = #{averagePriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
average_price_unit_text = #{averagePriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
average_price_unit = #{averagePriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
price_range_code = #{priceRangeCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
price_range_text = #{priceRangeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bottom_price = #{bottomPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
bottom_price_unit_code = #{bottomPriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
bottom_price_unit_text = #{bottomPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bottom_price_unit = #{bottomPriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
top_price = #{topPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
top_price_unit_code = #{topPriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
top_price_unit_text = #{topPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
top_price_unit = #{topPriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acre_cost_price = #{acreCostPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
acre_cost_price_unit_code = #{acreCostPriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
acre_cost_price_unit_text = #{acreCostPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acre_cost_price_unit = #{acreCostPriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
field_price = #{fieldPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
field_price_unit_code = #{fieldPriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
field_price_unit_text = #{fieldPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_price_unit = #{fieldPriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
retail_price_unit_code = #{retailPriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
retail_price_unit_text = #{retailPriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
retail_price_unit = #{retailPriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
trade_price = #{tradePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
trade_price_unit_code = #{tradePriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
trade_price_unit_text = #{tradePriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_price_unit = #{tradePriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
e_commerce_price = #{eCommercePrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
e_commerce_price_unit_code = #{eCommercePriceUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
e_commerce_price_unit_text = #{eCommercePriceUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
e_commerce_price_unit = #{eCommercePriceUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
average_weight = #{averageWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mango_grade = #{mangoGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
